data.prayer: Please, convict the 20,606 believers in Zanzibar North, Tanzania to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zanzibar North, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Zanzibar North to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Zanzibar North. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Zanzibar North. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Shirazi people might believe through him.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Zanzibar North.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Zanzibar North, Tanzania.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 20,606 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Zanzibar North
location.people_groups_list: Safwa, Jew, Swahili-speaking, Gujarati Creole, Hindi, Swahili, Tumbatu
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Safwa (439,000), Jew, Swahili-speaking (500), Gujarati Creole (84,000), Hindi (68,000), Swahili, Tumbatu (85,000)
